javelin.model.unit.feat.attack

Class WeaponFinesse

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.feat.Feat
      • javelin.model.unit.feat.attack.WeaponFinesse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class WeaponFinesse
extends Feat
    See the d20 SRD for more info. TODO the way it's working right now, an Attack that uses Weapon Finesse can only be upgraded through Monster.changedexteritymodifier(int). Ideally, it should choose between the best of either bonus.
